column3: There ain't nothing like them first loves,, baby
column6: Giving my old letterman's jacket away
column8: But now it's you and me talking on the phone till 4 AM
column10: Making me feel young again like ain't a damn thing changed
column14: Makes me want to sneak down your driveway
column16: Get in girl,, we'll roll until the dirt road ends
column17: You can climb up in that backseat
column18: With your pretty little bare feet
column19: Get the butterflies like we used to
column24: I thought them feelings was long gone,, baby
column25: But you take me back in time
column26: Just like spring break in Panama City
column27: Girl from Indiana sure was pretty
column28: But she ain't got nothing on you tonight
column29: Because you're like the summer loving don't come or go
column31: I wake up in the morning feeling like a first kiss
column32: Every time your lips touch mine
column37: Looking back I wish I could put you inside every memory
column39: You can be my first love
